Hello!

patterns: Za šta se koristi selekcija featura?
Sta je selekcija featura i zasto se koristi
responses: Feature selection za odredjeni izlaz odredjuje koje ulaze je najbolje koristiti za najtacniji model!
Pre nego sto trenirate model preporucljivo je koristiti selekciju featura, kako bismo odredili koji ulazi su najbolji za postizanje najtacnijeg modela!
Feature selection je proces odabira podskupa relevantnih featura za upotrebu u konstrukciji modela
Selekcija featura odredjuje koji featuri su najbolji(najrelevantniji) za izbor ulaza
Selekcija featura se koristi za odabir najboljih featura za model neuronske mreze

patterns: What is feature selection used for
responses: Feature selection for a particular output determines which inputs are best used for the most accurate model!
Before you train a model, it is recommended to use a selection of features, in order to determine which inputs are the best to achieve the most accurate model!

patterns: Za sta se koristi linerna regresija?
responses: Linearna regresija se koristi za podatke koji su korelisani, preporucujem Vam da pogledate korelacionu matricu kako biste videli korelaciju izmedju podataka!

patterns: What is linear regression used for?
responses: Linear regression is used for data that is correlated, I recommend you look at the correlation matrix to see the correlation between the data!
Korelacija predstavlja zavisnost izmedju promenljivih i za prikaz korelacija izmedju featura koristi se korelaciona matrica!

patterns: What is the correlation useful for?
responses: Correlation is the dependence between variables and a correlation matrix is ​​used to display correlations between features!

patterns: Za sta je koristi korelaciona matrica?
responses: Korelaciona matrica predstavlja korelaciju izmedju svih podataka medjusobno i ako je vrednost 1 ili -1  ili bliska ovim vrednostima onda su podaci korelisani, a ukoliko je vrednost 0 ili je vrednost bliska nuli onda podaci nisu korelisani

patterns: What is the correlation matrix used for?
responses: The correlation matrix represents the correlation between all data with each other and if the value is 1 or -1 or close to these values then the data are correlated, and if the value is 0 or the value is close to zero then the data are not correlated

patterns: Sta su outlajeri i zasto su bitni?
responses: Outlieri su vrednosti koje odstupaju od uobicajenih vrednosti i treba ih izbrisati
Outlajeri su vrednstoi koje odudaraju od standardnih vrednosti i najcesce se prikazuju graficki na boxplotu

patterns: what are outliers and why are they important?
responses: Outliers are values that deviate from the usual values and should be deleted
Outliers are values that deviate from standard values and are most often displayed graphically on the boxplot

patterns: Da li mozes da mi pomognes?
Da li možeš da mi pomogneš?
Ne znam nista o neuronskim mrezama,mozete li da mi pomognete?
Totalni sam pocetnik,potrebna mi je pomoc za razumevanje neuronskih mreza
Treba mi pomoc oko neuronskih mreza
responses: Mogu da ti pomognem,postavi mi bilo koje pitanje
Pokusacu da ti pomognem,postavi mi pitanje :D
Bice mi drago da ti pomognem na bilo koji nacin
Sta te konkretno muci,mozes slobodno da me pitas

patterns: I don't know anything about neural networks, can you help me?
I am a total beginner, I need help to understand neural networks
I need help with neural networks
responses: I can help you, ask me any question
I will try to help you, ask me a question :D
I will be glad to help you in any way
What exactly is bothering you, feel free to ask me
Zovem se Ivan i predstavljam tim Neuraro
Mozes me zvati Ivan i predstavljam tim Neuraro
Moje ime je Ivan i predstavljam tim Neuraro

patterns: I would like to meet you
responses: My name is Ivan and I represent the Neuraro team
You can call me Ivan and I represent the Neuraro team
Neuronske mreze rade samo sa brojevima, da bismo pretvorili stringove u brojeve koristimo enkodiranje
Enkodiranje sluzi za prebacivanje stringova u brojeve, jer neuronske mreze rade samo sa brojevima
Enkodiranje se koristi za prebacivanje stringova u brojeve kako bi neuronske mreze mogle da rade sa takvim podacima
Neural networks work only with numbers, we use encoding to convert strings into numbers
Encoding uses for converting strings to numbers, because neural networks only work with numbers
Encoding is used to convert strings to numbers so that neural networks can work with such data

patterns: Hvala ti sto si mi pomogao
Mnogo ti hvala, pomogao si mi mnogo da shvatim neuronske mreze
Hvala ti sto si mi pomogao, ne bih mogao da razumem neuronske mreze bez tvoje pomoci
responses: Drago mi je da sam ti pomogao :D
Ako ti je potrbna jos neka pomoc,samo reci
Uvek sam na raspolaganju, ako ti je potrebna pomoc

patterns: Thank you very much, you helped me a lot to understand neural networks
Thank you so much for your help
Thank you for helping me, I could not understand neural networks without your help
responses: I'm glad I helped you :)
If you need any more help, just say so
I'm always available if you need help

patterns: Koliko podataka treba izabrati za trening skup?
Koliko podataka je poželjno koristiti za trening i testni skup?
Šta je najoptimalnija opcija za izbor trening i testnog skupa?
Koja je najbolja opcija za izbor velicine trening i test skupa
Preporuka za velicinu trening i test skupa
Koliko podataka je najbolje za izbor testnih podataka
Koliko podataka je najbolje za izbor trening podataka
responses: Preporucujem Vam da izabere 70%-90% podataka za trening skup i 10%-30% podataka za testni skup
Praksa je pokazala da je najbolje koristiti 70%-90% podataka za trening skup i 10%-30% podataka za testni skup
Najbolja opcija je 70%-90% podataka za trening skup i 10%-30% za testni skup

patterns: How much data should be selected for a training set?
How much data is desirable to use for training and test set?
What is the best option for choosing a training and test set?
What is the best option for choosing the size of the training and test set
Recommendation for size training and test set
How much data is best for selecting test data
How much data is best for choosing training data
responses: I recommend that you choose 70%-90% of the data for the training set and 10%-30% of the data for the test set
Practice has shown that it is best to use 70%-90% of the data for the training set and 10%-30% of the data for the test set
The best option is 70%-90% data for the training set and 10%-30% for the test set

patterns: Kako da znam koju vrednost da izaberem za velicinu serije
Koja vrednost je optimalna za izbor velicine serije?
Sta mi preporucujete za odabir velicine serije
Koja je najbolja opcija za izbor velicine serije
Koja je najbolja opcija za izbor velicine serije
responses: Batch size(velicina serije) predstavlja broj uzoraka koji ce biti propagirani kroz mrezu, najbolje je poceti sa vrednoscu 16 ili 32, a nakon toga povecavati batch size i pronaci najoptimalniju vrednost

patterns: How do I know which value to choose for batch size
What value is optimal for batch size selection?
What do you recommend for me to choose for batch size
What is the best option for choosing the batch size
responses: Batch size is the number of samples that will be propagated through the network, it is best to start with a value of 16 or 32, and then increase the batch size and find the most optimal value

patterns: Za sta se koristi stepen odbacivanja
responses: Stepen odbacivanja je tehnika koja ispusta neurone iz neuronske mreze ili ih 'ignorise' tokom treninga, drugim recima, razliciti neuroni se privremeno uklanjaju iz mreze.
Dropout is a technique that drops neurons from the neural network or ignores them during training, in other words, various neurons are temporarily removed from the network.

patterns: Zasto ne mogu da izaberem opciju momentum?
Kako mogu da izaberem opciju momentum
Zasto ne mogu da unesem ni jednu opciju za momentum
Zasto ne mogu da promenim momentum
responses: Ukoliko izaberete SGD optimizator ili RMSprop optimizator mozete da unesete bilo koju vrednost za momentum. Inace momentum predstavlja varijantu stohastickog gradijenta spustanja

patterns: Why can't I choose the momentum option?
How can I choose the momentum option
Why can't I enter any momentum options
Why can't I change the momentum
responses: If you select SGD optimizer or RMSprop optimizer you can enter any value for momentum. Otherwise, momentum is a variant of the stochastic gradient of descent

Momentum je prosirenje algoritma optimizacije gradijenta spustanja koji omogucava pretrazi da izgradi inerciju u pravcu i prostoru za pretragu i prevazidje oscilacije bucnih nagiba i obale preko ravnih tacaka prostora za pretragu.

Momentum is an extension of the descent gradient optimization algorithm that allows the search to build inertia in the direction and search space and overcome the oscillations of noisy slopes and shoreline across the flat points of the search space.

patterns: Šta oznacava opcija sprecavanje povecanja gubitka?
Za sta se koristi opcija 'sprecavanje povecanja gubitka'
Za sta se koristi opcija sprecavanje povecanja gubitka
Za sta sluzi opcija 'sprecavanje povecanja gubitka'
Za sta sluzi opcija sprecavanje povecanja gubitka
responses: Ukoliko odaberete opciju 'Yes' sprecicete overfitovanje modela to jest preucavanje modela

patterns: What does the 'prevent loss increases' option mean?
What is the 'prevent loss increase' option used for?
What is the 'prevent loss increases' option for?
responses: If you select the 'Yes' option, you will prevent the model from being overfitted

Overfitovanje predstavlja prekomerno pilagodjavanje to jest pravljenje modela koji previse blisko ili tacno odgovara odredjenom skupu podataka, pa stoga mozda ndece da se uklopi u dodatne podatke ili pouzdano predvidi buduca zapazanja u testom skupu.

Overfitting is over-adjustment, that is, making a model that fits too closely or accurately to a particular data set, and therefore may not fit into the additional data or reliably predict future observations in the test set.

patterns: Zasto ne mogu da podesim opciju 'stopa regularizacije'?
Kako da odaberem opciju stopa regularizacija?
Zasto ne mogu da podesim opciju 'stopa regularizacije'?
Zasto ne mogu da odaberem opciju 'stopa regularizacija'?
Kako da odaberem opciju stopa regularizacija?
responses: Ukoliko izaberete L1 ili L2 regularizaciju onda cete moci da podesite ovu opciju

patterns: Why can't I set the regularization rate option?
Why can't I select the Regularization Rate option?
How do I choose the Regularization Rate option?
Why can't I set the 'regularization rate' option?
Why can't I select the 'Regularization Rate option'?
How do I choose the 'Regularization Rate option'?
responses: If you select L1 or L2 regularization then you will be able to adjust this option

patterns: Kako da znam koliki broj epoha treba da izaberem
Koliko epoha je pozeljno da izaberem
responses: Kada pokrenete treniranje modela videcete grafike i ukoliko su na graficima ravne linije u nekom trenurku, preporucujem Vam da smanjite broj epoha kako ne biste gubili procesorsko vreme

patterns: How do I know how many epochs to choose
How many epochs is desirable to choose
The best choice for the number of epochs?
How many epochs should I choose
responses: When you start model training you will see graphics and if the graphics are straight lines in a moment, I recommend that you reduce the number of epochs so as not to waste CPU time
Regularizacija je proces dodavanja informacija u cilju resavanja lose postavljenog problema ili sprecavanja prekomernog prilagodjavanja
Regularization is the process of adding information in order to solve a poorly set problem or prevent over-adjustment

patterns: Za sta se koristi L1 regularizacija?
responses: L1 regularizacija ili lasso je tehnika kojom se koeficijenti nekih feature svode na 0 tako da na ovaj nacin za treniranje linearnog modela neki featuri se potpuno uklanjaju.

patterns: What is L1 regularization used for?
responses: L1 regularization or lasso is a technique by which the coefficients of some features are reduced to 0 so that in this way to train a linear model some features are completely removed.

patterns: Za sta se koristi L2 regularizacija?
responses: L2 regularizacija ili ridge regression (grebena regresija) je tehnika kojom se koeficijenti nekih feature priblizavaju 0 tako da se uticaj feature smanjuje za treniranje mreze.

patterns: What is L2 regularization used for?
responses: L2 regularization or ridge regression is a technique by which the coefficients of some features approach 0 so that the impact of the feature is reduced for network training
Stepen ucenja kontrolise koliko brzo se model prilagodjava problemu

patterns: What is the degree of learning?
responses: Learning rate controls how quickly the model adapts to the problem.
Optimizator je funkcija ili algoritam koji menja atribute neuronske mreze, kao sto su tezine i brzina ucenja. Dakle pomaze u smanjenju ukupnog gubitka i poboljsanju tacnosti.

patterns: What is an optimizer used for?
responses: An optimizer is a function or algorithm that changes neural network attributes, such as difficulty and learning speed. So it helps reduce overall loss and improve accuracy.

patterns: Mozes li mi pomoci da treniram model?
Treba mi pomoc oko treniranja modela
responses: Hajde da ti pomognem, prvo treba ucitati csv fajl i nakon toga treba odabrati ulazne i izlazne parametre. Sledeca stvar koju je potrebno da uradis je podesavanje hiperparametara i nakon toga je sve spremno. Sve sto je ostalo da odradis je da kliknes na dugme TRAIN MODEL i treniranje modela ce poceti.

patterns: I don't know how to train a model
Can you help me train a model?
responses: Let me help you, first you need to load the csv file and then you need to select the input and output parameters. The next thing you need to do is adjust the hyperparameters and then everything is ready. All you have to do is click on the TRAIN MODEL button and model training will begin.

patterns: Koji je optimizator najbolji za treniranje mreze
Sta biste mi preporucili za izbor optimizatora
Koja je najbolja opcija za izbor optimizatora
Koji optimizator je najbolje da izaberem
Sta mi preporucujete za izbor optimizatora
Sta mi preporucujes za izbor optimizatora
responses: Adam je najbolji optimizator, tako da Vam preporucujem izbor ovog optimizatora. Ako zelite da trenirate neuronsku mrezu za krace vreme i efikasnije, onda je Adam optimizator najbolja opcija. Za retke podatke koristite optimizatore sa dinamickom brzinom ucenja

patterns: Which optimizer is best for training network
What would you recommend me to choose an optimizer
What is the best option for choosing an optimizer
What do you recommend for choosing an optimizer
responses: Adam is the best optimizer, so I recommend choosing this optimizer. If you want to train your neural network in a shorter time and more efficiently, then the Adam optimizer is the best option. For rare data, use optimizers with dynamic learning speed

patterns: Kako da izaberem ulazne podatke za treniranje najtacnijeg modela
Kako da znam koje ulazne podatke mogu da izaberem za treniranje neuronske mreze
Koje podatke je najbolje izabrati za ulazne?
Kako da izaberem ulazne feature za treniranje najtacnijeg modela
responses: Klikom na karticu 'Input and Output parameters' videcete dugme 'Feature Selection' i klikom na dugme mozete izabrati ulazne podatka za treniranje najtacnijeg modela

patterns: How to choose the input data for training the most accurate model
How do I know which input data to choose for neural network training
Which data is best to choose for input?
responses: By clicking on the 'Input and Output parameters' tab you will see the 'Feature Selection' button and by clicking on the button you can select the input data for training the most accurate model.

patterns: Koji problemi se mogu resiti klasifikacijom
responses: Klasifikacija se koristi ukoliko zelimo da predvidimo podatke koji su kategorijski, tako da za predvidjanje kategorijskih vrednosti preporucujem Vam  klasifikaciju

patterns: When it is advisable to use classification
What problems can be solved by classification
responses: The classification is used if we want to predict data that are categorical, so to predict categorical values, I recommend the classification

patterns: Za sta se koristi redno enkodiranje
Kada je pozeljno koristiti redno enkodiranje?
responses: Redno enkodiranje je tehnika kodiranja za rukovanje kategorickim varijablama. U ovoj tehnici, svakoj vrednosti se dodeljuje ceo broj na osnovu abecednog reda

patterns: What is label encoding used for?
When is it desirable to use label encoding
When you recommend using label encoding
responses: Label encoding is a coding technique for handling categorical variables. In this technique, each value is assigned an integer based on the alphabetical order.

patterns: Za sta se koristi one hot enkodiranje?
Kada je pozeljno koristiti one hot enkodiranje
Kada preporucujete upotrebu one hot enkodiranja
responses: One hot enkodiranje se koristi za pretvaranje kategorijskih promenljivih u format koji mogu lako da koriste algoritmi masinskog ucenja. Osnovna ideja one-hot enkodiranja je kreiranje novih promenljivih koje preuzimaju vrednost 0 i 1 da bi predstavljale originalne kategoricke vrednosti.

patterns: What is one hot encoding used for?
When is it desirable to use one hot encoding
When you recommend using one hot encoding
responses: One-hot encoding is used to convert categorical variables into a format that can be readily used by machine learning algorithms. The basic idea of one-hot encoding is to create new variables that take on values 0 and 1 to represent the original categorical values.

patterns: Za sta se koristi binarno enkodiranje
Kada je pozeljno koristiti binarno enkodiranje?
responses: Binarno enkodiranje je kombinacija hes kodiranja i one-hot kodiranja. U ovoj semi kodiranja, kategorijski feature se prvo konvertuje u numericki pomocu rednog kodera. Tada se brojevi transformisu u binarni broj. Nakon toga binarna vrednost se deli u razlicite kolone.

patterns: What is binary encoding used for?
When is it desirable to use binary encoding
When you recommend using binary encoding
responses: Binary encoding is a combination of Hash encoding and one-hot encoding. In this encoding scheme, the categorical feature is first converted into numerical using an ordinal encoder. Then the numbers are transformed in the binary number. After that binary value is split into different columns

patterns: Kada je pozeljno koristiti adam optimizator
responses: Adam optimizator  je zamenski algoritam optimizacije za stohasticki gradijentni spust za obuku modela dubokog ucenja. Adam kombinuje najbolja svojstva AdaGrad i RMSProp algoritama da bi obezbedio algoritam optimizacije koji moze da se nosi sa retkim gradijentima na bucnim problemima.

Adam optimizacija je metoda koja je efikasna kada se radi sa velikim problemom koji ukljucuje mnogo podataka ili parametara. Zahteva manje memorije i efikasan je. Intuitivno, to je kombinacija algoritma 'gradijentnog spustanja sa zamahom' i 'RMSP' algoritma

patterns: What is adam optimizer used for?
When is it desirable to use adam optimizer
When you recommend using adam optimizer
responses: Adam is a replacement optimization algorithm for stochastic gradient descent for training deep learning models. Adam combines the best properties of the AdaGrad and RMSProp algorithms to provide an optimization algorithm that can handle sparse gradients on noisy problems.

The method is really efficient when working with large problem involving a lot of data or parameters. It requires less memory and is efficient. Intuitively, it is a combination of the 'gradient descent with momentum' algorithm and the 'RMSP' algorithm.

patterns: Kada je pozeljno koristiti SGD optimizator
responses: Stohasticki gradijentni spust(SGD) je jednostavan, ali veoma efikasan pristup prilagodjavanju linearnih klasifikatora i regresora pod konveksnim funkcijama gubitka kao sto su (linearne) masine za vektore podrske i logisticka regresija.

patterns: What is SGD optimizer used for?
When is it desirable to use SGD optimizer
When you recommend using SGD optimizer
responses: Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) is a simple yet very efficient approach to fitting linear classifiers and regressors under convex loss functions such as (linear) Support Vector Machines and Logistic Regression.

patterns: Kada je pozeljno koristiti Adamax optimizator
responses: Adamax optimizator je varijanta adam optimizatora zasnovana na normi beskonacnosti. Podrazumevani parametri prate one navedene u radu. Adamax je ponekad bolji od adam optimizatora, posebno u modelima sa ugradnjom.

patterns: What is Adamax optimizer used for?
When is it desirable to use Adamax optimizer
When you recommend using Adamax optimizer
responses: The Adamax optimizer is a variant of the adam optimizer based on the infinity norm. The default parameters follow those listed in the paper. Adamax is sometimes better than the adam optimizer, especially in models with embeddings.

patterns: Kada je pozeljno koristiti RMSprop optimizator
responses: RMSprop optimizator je slican algoritmu gradijentnog spustanja sa impulsom. RMSprop optimizator ogranicava oscilacije u vertikalnom pravcu. Stoga, mozemo povecati nasu stopu ucenja i nas algoritam bi mogao da preduzme vece korake u horizontalnom pravcu konvergirajuci brze.

patterns: What is RMSprop optimizer used for?
When is it desirable to use RMSprop optimizer
When you recommend using RMSprop optimizer
responses: The RMSprop optimizer is similar to the gradient descent algorithm with momentum. The RMSprop optimizer restricts the oscillations in the vertical direction. Therefore, we can increase our learning rate and our algorithm could take larger steps in the horizontal direction converging faster.

patterns: Kada je pozeljno koristiti Adadelta optimizator
responses: Optimizator koji implementira Adadelta algoritam. Adadelta optimizacija je metoda stohastickog gradijenta spustanja koja se zasniva na adaptivnoj stopi ucenja po dimenziji da bi se resila 2 nedostatka: kontinuirano opadanje stopa ucenja tokom treninga. Potreba za rucno odabranom globalnom stopom ucenja.

patterns: What is Adadelta optimizer used for?
When is it desirable to use Adadelta optimizer
When you recommend using Adadelta optimizer
responses: Optimizer that implements the Adadelta algorithm. Adadelta optimization is a stochastic gradient descent method that is based on adaptive learning rate per dimension to address two drawbacks: The continual decay of learning rates throughout training. The need for a manually selected global learning rate

patterns: Kada je pozeljno koristiti Adagrad optimizator
responses: Adagrad je optimizator sa stopama ucenja specificnih za parametre, koje su prilagodjene u odnosu na to koliko cesto se parametar azurira tokom treninga. Sto vise azuriranja parametar primi, manja su azuriranja.

patterns: What is Adagrad optimizer used for?
When is it desirable to use Adagrad optimizer
When you recommend using Adagrad optimizer
responses: Adagrad is an optimizer with parameter-specific learning rates, which are adapted relative to how frequently a parameter gets updated during training. The more updates a parameter receives, the smaller the updates.

patterns: Kada je pozeljno koristiti Ftrl optimizator
responses: Follow The Regularized Leader (FTRL) je algoritam optimizacije razvijen u Google-u za predvidjanje stope klikova pocetkom 2010-ih. Najprikladniji ja za plitke modele sa velikim i retkim prostorima.

patterns: What is Ftrl optimizer used for?
When is it desirable to use Ftrl optimizer
When you recommend using Ftrl optimizer
responses: Follow The Regularized Leader (FTRL) is an optimization algorithm developed at Google for click-through rate prediction in the early 2010s. It is most suitable for shallow models with large and sparse feature spaces.

patterns: Koji je najbolji izbor aktivacione funkcije za treniranje modela
Koja aktivaciona funkcija ima najbolje karakteristike
responses: ReLU aktivaciona funkcija se siroko koristi i podrazumevani je izbor jer daje bolje rezultate. Ako naidjemo na slucaj mrtvih neurona u nasim mrezama, ReLU funkcija je najbolji izbor. ReLU funkciju treba koristiti samo u skrivenim slojevima.

patterns: Which activation function is the best?
What is the best choice of activation function for model training
Which activation function has the best characteristics
responses: ReLU activation function is widely used and is default choice as it yields better results. If we encounter a case of dead neurons in our networks the leaky ReLU function is the best choice. ReLU function should only be used in the hidden layers.

Neuronska mreza je niz algoritama koji nastoje da prepoznaju osnovne odnose u skupu podataka kroz proces koji oponasa nacin na koji ljudski mozak funkcionise. Neuronske mreze su tehnika za pravljenje kompjuterskog programa koji uci iz podataka. Ovo je idealno mesto ako zelite da naucite sve o neuronskim mrezama. :)

A neural network is a series of algorithms that seek to recognize basic relationships in a data set through a process that mimics the way the human brain functions. Neural networks are a technique for creating a computer program that learns from data. This is an ideal place if you want to learn all about neural networks. :)
Ljudi ce verovatno praviti greske tokom prikupljanja podataka, dok instrumenti koji prikupljaju podatke mogu biti netacni, sto dovodi do gresaka u skupu podataka. Greske su poznate kao sum.

patterns: What is noise in neural network
responses: People are likely to make mistakes during data collection, while data collection instruments may be inaccurate, leading to errors in the data set. Mistakes are known as noise.
Model u masinskom ucenju je rezultat algoritma masinskog ucenja koji se pokrece na podacima. Model predstavlja ono sto je naucio algoritam masinskog ucenja
A model in machine learning is the output of a machine learning algorithm run on data. A model represents what was learned by a machine learning algorithm

Neuroni u modelima masinskog ucenja su cvorovi kroz koje teku podaci i proracuni. Neuroni rade ovako: primaju jedan ili vise ulaznih signala. Ovi ulazi mogu doci ili iz skupa sirovih podataka ili iz neurona pozicioniranih na prethodnom sloju neuronske mreze.

Neurons in machine learning models are the nodes through which data and calculations flow. Neurons work like this: they receive one or more input signals. These inputs can come either from a set of raw data or from neurons positioned on the previous layer of the neural network.

Epoha je termin koji se koristi u masinskom ucenju i oznacava broj prolaza celokupnog skupa podataka za obuku koji je algoritam masinskog ucenja zavrsio. Skupovi podataka se obicno grupisu u grupe (narocito kada je kolicina podataka veoma velika)

An epoch is a term used in machine learning and indicates the number of passes of the entire training dataset the machine learning algorithm has completed. Datasets are usually grouped into batches (especially when the amount of data is very large)

Hiperparametar je parametar masinskog ucenja cija se vrednost bira pre nego sto se algoritam za ucenje obuci. Hiperparametre ne treba mesati sa parametrima. U masinskom ucenju, parametar oznake se koriste za identifikaciju promenljivih cije se vrednosti uce tokom treninga.

A hyperparameter is a machine learning parameter whose value is chosen before a learning algorithm is trained. Hyperparameters should not be confused with parameters . In machine learning, the label parameter is used to identify variables whose values are learned during training.
Sloj je kontejner koji obicno prima tezinski ulaz, transformise ga skupm uglavnom nelinearnih funkcija i zatim prosledjuje vrednost kao izlaz sledecem sloju.
Sloj je kontejner koji obicno prima tezinski ulaz, transformise ga skupm uglavnom nelinearnih funkcija i zatim prosledjuje vrednost kao izlaz sledecem sloju.

patterns: Kako da proverim da li mi je model dobar
Kako da proverim tacnost mog modela
Kako da proverim da li je moj model ispravan
responses: Ukoliko zelite da proverite da li regresioni model dobar onda gledamo Srednju kvadratnu gresku(Mean Squared Error) i greska modela mora biti mala, a ukoliko gledamo da li je klasifikacioni model ispravan onda gledamo tacnost (Accuracy) modela i potrebno je da tacnost bude sto vece na kraju treniranja modela. Ove statistike se gledaju na graficima, klikom na dugme 'TRAIN MODEL' prikazace se grafici

patterns: How to check if my model is good
How to check the accuracy of my model
How to check if my model is correct
responses: If you want to check if the regression model is good then we look at the Mean Squared Error and the model error must be small, and if we look to see if the classification model is correct then we look at the accuracy of the model and it is necessary that the accuracy is as high as possible at the end of model training. These statistics are viewed on graphs, clicking on the 'TRAIN MODEL' button will display graphs
